trans-unit.resname: DDP·1 | Avenger of Zendikar | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

trans-unit.source: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.
